aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: I am frontend developer with a focus on JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular, and I’m passionate about creating modern, user-friendly web applications. My strong sense of design comes from my previous work as a photographer, which now helps me develop intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.
aboutMe.location: I'm based in Essen, Germany. I'm open to different ways of working, including remote work and relocation, depending on the opportunity and team.
aboutMe.learning: Personal and professional growth is very important to me. I’m currently deepening my knowledge in backend development, focusing on Django, SQL, REST APIs, and Docker. This way, I continuously expand my skills to become an even better developer.
aboutMe.problemSolving: I approach challenges with a mix of logic and creativity. I see obstacles as learning opportunities and stay persistent in finding clean, effective solutions. Collaboration, curiosity, and analytical thinking are key to how I solve problems in coding.

skills.title: My skills
skills.intro: Here’s a look at the front-end technologies I’ve worked with so far. Through each project, I’ve deepened my understanding and learned how to apply these tools effectively to create engaging and functional user interfaces.
skills.learningText: I'm always looking to expand my skill set and explore new technologies. Frameworks like Vue.js or React.js really interest me because they offer powerful ways to build modern, interactive web applications. I'm also excited to dive deeper into backend development to better understand the full picture of web applications and become a more well-rounded developer.

join.title: Join
join.subtitle: JavaScript | CSS | HTML
join.description: Responsive Kanban-style task manager with drag and drop, user and category assignment. This was a team project. I was mainly responsible for developing the board page with drag and drop functionality and the add-task page for creating and categorizing tasks.

sharkie.title: Sharkie
sharkie.subtitle: JavaScript | CSS | HTML
sharkie.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie find coins and poison bottles to fight the killer whale.

crm.title: Simple CRM
crm.subtitle: Angular | Firebase
crm.description: A very simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.subtitle: JavaScript | HTML | CSS | API
pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

dabubble.title: DABubble (est. Release Ende 2025 – alpha version now available for testing)
dabubble.subtitle: Angular | SCSS | Firestore
dabubble.description: A Slack clone developed in a three-person team. The app enables real-time communication with channels, direct messages, and threads. Users can use emojis, edit messages, and everything updates live via Firestore. It also includes authentication with login and registration, allowing users to create their own accounts. The project is still in development, but the current progress can already be viewed on GitHub.

kanMind.title: KanMind (Backend)
kanMind.subtitle: Python | Django | Django REST Framework | REST API
kanMind.description: A REST API backend for a ToDo app built with Django and DRF. It provides CRUD endpoints for tasks and user management. Includes token-based authentication and fine-grained permissions for protected operations. The DRF browsable API makes development and testing easier. More details, endpoint documentation, and setup instructions can be found in the README.

logfiles.text:
The website provider automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. These include:

- Operating system used
- Referrer URL

This data cannot be assigned to specific individuals. No combination with other data sources is made.
